dmca.title: [ABUSE] UEFA Champions League AV Infringement NRID13340]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Policy
Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, May 09, 2006 11:04 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] UEFA Champions League AV Infringement NRID13340]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] UEFA Champions League AV Infringement NRID13340]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] UEFA Champions League AV Infringement NRID13340
Date:         Tue, 9 May 2006 16:54:01 +0100
From:         Jim Chen <JimC@nr-online.com>
To:         <webmaster@souya.cn>
CC:         'Tim Cooper' <TimC@nr-online.com>, admins@theplanet.com,
abuse@theplanet.com





Dear Sirs,



NRID13340



We write on behalf of UEFA who own and/or controls all rights for the UEFA Champions
League.



We have noticed that your website, http://www.hao1bai.com/  is displaying UEFA
Champions League A/V content.



We wish to make you aware that your present use is an infringement of UEFA's rights.
 Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your web sites
and confirm to us via email that you have done so.



Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an express or
implied waiver of any of UEFA's rights or remedies, all of which are expressly
reserved.



We thank you for your cooperation.



Yours faithfully,



Tim Cooper



NetResult

A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd

Mulberry House,

583 Fulham Road

London SW6 5UA

UK



尊敬的女士先生：



我们是代表 UEFA向你们写这封电子邮件。UEFA 拥有使用和控制 the UEFA Champions League 所有版权.



我们注意到您的网站http://www.hao1bai.com/ 目前在直播 the UEFA Champions
League的视频/音频内容。



我们希望贵网站意识到您现在的行为是对UEFA权利的侵犯。因此，请尽快终止所有
对the UEFA Champions League的侵权行为并回复我们是否会执行以上要求。



通过此信，UEFA 希望传达他们并无意放弃任何合法权利或索赔， UEFA 将明确地
保留一切权力.

谢谢您的合作。

此致



敬礼




Tim Cooper


                      NetResult

                                                                       A Division of
Projector
NetResult Ltd


Mulberry House,


                                            583 Fulham Road


London SW6 5UA

                                                                       UK




                                    2006年05月09日




- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/
